# memoize

```text
usage: memoize [-h]

```

Toggles memoization (caching).

Useful for diagnosing caching-related bugs. Decreases performance.
### Optional arguments

|Short|Long|Help|
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
|-h|--help|show this help message and exit|
